Video evidence: The expert analyzed the video footage of the rally and found no evidence that President Trump made any effort to stop the "send her back" chants, contradicting his claim that he did.
Time stamps: The expert used the C-SPAN video of the rally to mark the time stamps of when the "send her back" chants occurred, providing a clear timeline of events.
Audience reaction: The expert noted that when Trump mentioned Ilhan Omar's name, the crowd loudly booed, indicating a negative sentiment towards her. This sets the context for the subsequent chants.
Trump: s response: Despite claiming that he stopped the chants, Trump's response during the interview the next day only mentioned his disagreement with the chants but did not indicate any action taken to stop them. This inconsistency raises doubts about the authenticity of his claim.
